name: Emergency Rescue Operations - Fire Truck Driving
name_original: Emergency Rescue Operations - Fire Truck Driving
description:
Rescue 911 - there’s a widespread fire emergency & people are injured. Be the firefighter and save lives. You need to drive the firetruck in a big urban city and respond to emergency situations. Use the water gun to put out the fire. The fire brigade department also happens to run a first aid unit. Drive the ambulance in the city and reach the emergency scene quickly to make sure the injured people get medical attention. Just make sure you drive carefully and don’t bump into traffic and fixtures as it will only add delays for the people depending upon you. The firetruck and ambulance are ready for firefighting and rescue duty.

Drive rescue and emergency vehicles in the urban city as well as offroad. Fire extinguishing can be tricky so make sure you throw the water with pressure and keep the direction of the water gun steady. Keep the firetruck emergency siren on and speed away. Rush towards the emergency scene to save the day and be the superhero fireman. Use your water gun to put the fire out sensibly as you will also have to collect water from multiple points to fill up the firetruck. Since it is a big urban city, there can be various fires and emergency situations. A fire in a high rise building, an airplane, fire caused due to a traffic accident – all these emergency situations can arise in a big urban city and it is your duty to make sure you respond to all these emergency situations by driving the firetruck in time for rescue.

If you like firetruck and emergency rescue games, we are hoping you’ll like this one too. Let us know what you think.
